name: Aliens Have NO CHILL
description:
Recommended age : 16+

Aliens have no child is a university project. It main mechanics are dialogue and basic top down shooter mechanics.

You are an exceptionally average soldier on a mission to prevent the oncoming alien invasion and you have no idea what to do if you are not told exactly what to do. You literally get objectives and follow them from both sides!

Also, your seem to be killing sheep...
